nodes.text: Lieutenant Hol B'shaki or Hool was a Nagai soldier who fought in the Nagai–Tof War. Hool served under Commander Ozrei N'takkilomandrife and was ordered to lead the attack force in the Second Battle of Endor. He led a squad of Nagai and Maccabree warriors in an assault on the Alliance of Free Planets flight center.

The Marvel comic calls this Nagai "Hool", yet both Ultimate Alien Anthology and Star Wars Gamer 1 call him Hol. It is clear from the context that these are the same individuals. As many of the Nagai names in the original Marvel series have been retconned into nicknames, it is likely this occurred here.
